alert.note: Alert for Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT TURNER AND NORTHERN WORTH COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 305 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arabi, or 10 miles northwest of Ashburn, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashburn, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Warwick, Amboy, Sibley, Inaha, Coverdale, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Dakota, and Doles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
